pluggable.name: Feed List
pluggable.author: Owen Winkler
Chris Meller
pluggable.description: Outputs an RSS or Atom feed as an unordered list.

help.value: In the plugin configuration can be added multiple feeds. The feeds can be added directly to the template with <?php echo feedlist[0];?> (the 0 stands for the first feed and so on.) or as a block to an area. For each block feed and item count could be set individually.
